title: Red Terror
summary: The Red Terror (Russian: красный террор, romanized: krasnyy terror) in Soviet Russia was a campaign of political repression and executions carried out by the Bolsheviks, chiefly through the Cheka, the Bolshevik secret police. It started in late August 1918 after the beginning of the Russian Civil War[1][2][3] and lasted until 1922.[4][5]
